algebraic_word_problem: A machine can complete a task in 12 hours, and another machine can complete it in 16 hours. How long will it take them to finish the task working together?
step_by_step_solution:
Rate of Machine 1 = 1/12 tasks/hour, Rate of Machine 2 = 1/16 tasks/hour
Together: 1/12 + 1/16 = 7/48
Time = 1 / (7/48) = 6.86 hours
